attributes.action: forgiveness appeal for a pakistani person who saved the uk flag banned from ukba

name hamid hamid home office number h1233136
i request to great britain parliament forgive this person who saved the flag by the name of humanity
attributes.background:
a pakistani person who is banned from ukba saved the uk flag was in fire i ask him why did you that he said i love that flag i told him fir sponsor he said i am banned from ukba i got his little info his name is hamid hamid
ho number is h1233136
i request to great parliament to forgive him
